[\[292b.2\]]dbang bcu ni/_tshe la dbang ba dang /_yo byad la dbang ba dang /_sems la dbang ba dang /_las la dbang ba dang /_skye ba la dbang ba dang /_mos pa la dbang ba dang /_smon lam la dbang ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang /_chos la dbang ba dang /_ye shes la dbang ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi
[\[292b.3\]]chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba dang /_ca co mi mnga' ba dang /_sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang /_tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang /_so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang /_'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang /_brtson 'grus
[\[292b.4\]]nyams pa med pa dang /_dran pa nyams pa med pa dang /_shes rab nyams pa med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang /_lus kyi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_ngag gi las thams cad ye shes
[\[292b.5\]]kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_yid kyi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la
[\[292b.6\]]'jug pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa'o/_/sde snod gsum ni/_'dul ba'i sde snod dang /_mdo sde'i sde snod dang /_chos mngon pa'i sde snod do/_/gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis ni/_mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i
[\[292b.7\]]sde dang /_lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /_gleng gzhi'i sde dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /_de lta bur byung ba'i sde dang /_skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /_rmad du byung ba'i sde dang /_gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]sde'o/_/dgongs pa bzhi ni/_mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa dang /_dus gzhan la dgongs pa dang /_don gzhan la dgongs pa dang /_gang zag gi bsam pa la dgongs pa'o/_/ldem por dgongs pa bzhi ni/_gzhug pa la ldam por dgongs pa dang /_mtshan nyid la
[\[293a.2\]]ldem por dgongs pa dang /_gnyen po la ldem por dgongs pa dang /_bsgyur ba la ldem por dgongs pa'o/_/bden pa bzhi ni/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mo/_/sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la bzhi ste/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_
[\[293a.3\]]bdag med pa'o/_/kun 'byung gi bden pa la yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_kun 'byung dang /_rgyu dang /_rkyen dang /_rab tu 'byed pa'o/_/'gog pa'i bden pa la yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_'gog pa dang /_bzhi ba dang /_gya nom pa dang /_nges par 'byung ba'o/_/lam la yang bzhi ste/_lam dang /_rigs
[\[293a.4\]]pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_nges par 'byin pa'o/_/nyan thos kyi tshogs lam la lnga ste/_so so skye bo'i tshul khrims dang /_dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa dang /_zas kyi tshod shes pa dang /_nam gyi cha stod cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang /_shes bzhin du gnas par mngon par dga' ba'o/_/
[\[293a.5\]]sbyor ba'i lam ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi ste/_drod dang /_rtse mo dang /_bzod pa dang /_'jig rten chos kyi mchog go/_/mthong ba'i lam ni sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug go/_/bsgom pa'i lam ni/_lam chung ngu dang /_lam 'bring po dang /_lam chen po dang /_sbyor ba'i lam dang /_bar
[\[293a.6\]]chad med pa'i lam dang /_rnam par grol ba'i lam dang /_khyad par gyi lam mo/_/lam chung ngu la yang rnam pa gsum ste/_chung ngu'i chung ngu dang /_chung ngu'i 'bring po dang /_chung ngu'i chen po'o/_/lam 'bring po la yang gsum ste/_che 'bring chung gsum mo/_/lam chen po la yang gsum ste/_che
[\[293a.7\]]'bring chung gsum mo/_/mthar phyin pa'i lam ni/_mi slob pa'o/_/nyan thos kyi shes pa bcu drug ni/_sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /_sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa dang /_sdug bsngal la rjes su rtogs par shes
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]pa'o/_/kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /_kun 'byung la chos shes pa dang /_kun 'byung la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa dang /_kun 'byung la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'o/_/'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /_'gog pa la chos shes pa dang /_'gog pa
[\[293b.2\]]la chos rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa dang /_'gog pa la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'o/_/lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /_lam la chos shes pa dang /_lam la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa dang /_lam la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'o/_/nyan thos kyi rnam par
[\[293b.3\]]bral ba'i lam ni brgyad/_'jug pa bzhi dang /_'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi'o/_/'jug pa bzhi ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa la 'jug pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba la 'jug pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba la 'jug pa dang /_dgra bcom pa la 'jug pa'o/_/'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi ni/_rgyun du zhugs
[\[293b.4\]]pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa ni gnyis te/_rim gyis pa dang /_cig car nges par 'byung ba'o/_/rim gyis pa ni/_ji skad bstan pa yin no/_/cig car nges par 'byung ba ni/_gang bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs
[\[293b.5\]]par byas nas/_mi lcogs pa la brten te/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams cig car spong ste/_'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu nyid la gnas so/_/rang sangs rgyas ni gnyis te/_bse ru ltar gcig
[\[293b.6\]]tu gnas pa dang /_tshogs dang spyod pa'o/_/de ni nyan thos kyi sde snod la dmigs nas chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos grub pas sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sdug bsngal mthar phyin pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi lam ni brgyad de/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_snyoms par
[\[293b.7\]]'jug pa bzhi'o/_/bsam gtan bzhi ni dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa'o/_/snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]gyi skye mched do/_/bsam gtan dang po la yan lag lnga ste/_rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_bde ba dang /_sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/_bsam gtan gnyis pa la yan lag bzhi ste/_nang rab tu dang ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_bde ba dang /_
[\[294a.2\]]sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/_/gsum pa la yan lag lnga ste/_btang snyoms dang /_dran pa dang /_shes bzhin dang /_bde ba dang /_sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa la yan lag bzhi ste/_btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang /_dran pa yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[294a.3\]]sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang /_sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/_/yang gnyen po'i yan lag dang /_phan yon gyi yan lag dang /_de gnyi ka'i gnas kyi rang bzhin gyi yan lag go/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/_gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba
[\[294a.4\]]dang /_nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba dang /_sdug pa'i rnam pa mngon du byas nas gnas pa dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi
[\[294a.5\]]skye mched dang /_'du shes dang tshor ba dang 'gog pa mngon du byas nas gnas gnas pa'o/_/zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad ni/_dkar po dang /_dmar po dang /_ser po dang /_sngon po dang /_sdug pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_bzang po dang /_ngan pa'o/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
[\[294a.6\]]'jug pa dgu ni/_mi rtog pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_bde ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/_/zad
[\[294a.7\]]par gyi skye mched bcu ni/_zad par dkar po'i skye mched dang /_zad par dmar po'i skye mched dang /_zad par ser po'i skye mched dang /_zad par sngon po'i skye mched dang /_zad par sa'i skye mched dang /_zad par chu'i skye mched dang /_zad par me'i skye mched dang /_zad par rlung gi skye mched dang /_
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]zad par nam mkha'i skye mched dang /_zad par rnam par shes pa'i skye mched do/_/sems can gyi khams gsum ni/_'dod khams dang /_gzugs khams dang /_gzugs med pa'o/_/'dod pa'i khams na sems can gyi ris nyi shu gnas te/_tsha ba'i dmyal ba brgyad/_grang ba'i dmyal ba brgyad
[\[294b.2\]]do/_/nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba ni/_gcig gam gnyis sam dang por rang rang gi rgyu las 'grub pa'o/_/dud 'gro na chu dang tha dad nam mkha'i spyod yul lo/_/yi dgas rnams ni chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i pho brang na'o/_/mi'i gling bzhi ni/_ba lang spyod/_sgra mi snyan/_lus 'phags
[\[294b.3\]]po/_/'dzam bu gling ngo /_/lha'i ris drug ni/_rgyal chen ris bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed do/_/gzugs khams bcu bdun ni/_tshangs pa dang /_tshangs chen dang /_tshangs pa mdun na 'don no/_/

[\[294b.6\]]'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs chung ngu A tsAr+ya dpal brtsegs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//[{D4364}]@/_/pho brang stong thang lhan dkar gyi chos 'gyur ro cog gi dkar chag bzhugs/_@#/_/thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/

[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]ya grI ba'i gzungs/_sh+lo ka sum cu/_'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis zhus pa/_sh+lo ka sum cu/_'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i snying po/_/sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gsum/_'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi snying po/_/sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gnyis/_'phags pa
[\[303a.2\]]gzhang 'brum zhi bar byed pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gnyis/_'phags pa 'od zer can/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gnyis/_'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gnyis/_'phags pa dug sel gyi rig sngags/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa phyed dang gnyis/_'phags pa bar du gcod pa
[\[303a.3\]]thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gcig_/'phags pa lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i ming brgyad po/_/gsang sngags kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gcig_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal nas gsungs pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu/_'phags pa ngan
[\[303a.4\]]'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i snying po/_sgo ka nyi shu/_'phags pa ye shes ta la la/_sh+lo ka nyi shu/_'phags pa par+Na sha ba ri/_sh+lo ka nyi shu/_'phags pa yi dgas kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga/_sh+lo ka nyi shu/_'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags/_
[\[303a.5\]]sh+lo ka bcu dgu/_'phags pa sgo drug pa/_sh+lo ka bco brgyad/_'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa/_sh+lo ka bcu bdun/_'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po/_/sh+lo ka bcu drug_/'phags pa mchod pa'i sprin/_sh+lo ka bcu drug_/'phags pa las kyi sgrib thams cad rnam
[\[303a.6\]]par sbyong ba/_sh+lo ka bco lnga/_'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa/_sh+lo ka bco lnga/_'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa/_sh+lo ka bco lnga/_'phags pa nor bu bzang po'i snying po sh+lo ka bco lnga/_'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo dbugs chen po/_/sh+lo ka bcu
[\[303a.7\]]bzhi/_'phags pa phyir bzlog pa stobs can/_sh+lo ka bcu gsum/_'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/_sh+lo ka bcu gsum/_'phags pa bu mang po bton pa/_sh+lo ka bcu gsum/_'phags pa lha mo nag mo'i gzungs/_sh+lo ka bcu gsum/_'phags pa
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/_sh+lo ka bcu gnyis/_'phags pa dpal chen po'i mdo/_/sh+lo ka bcu gcig_/'phags pa bgegs sel ba'i mdo/_/sh+lo ka bcu/_'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba/_sh+lo ka bcu/_'phags pa nor bu bzang po'i snying po/_/sh+lo ka bcu/_
[\[303b.2\]]'phags pa gnod 'dzin chu dbang snying rje can gyi gzungs/_sh+lo ka bcu/_'phags pa 'brum bu'i nad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/_sh+lo ka bcu/_'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba/_sh+lo ka dgu/_'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/_sh+lo ka brgyad/_'phags pa dpal chen mo'i ming
[\[303b.3\]]bcu gnyis pa/_sh+lo ka brgyad/_'phags pa stong 'gyur gyi gzungs/_sh+lo ka bdun/_'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs/_sh+lo ka phyed dang bdun/_'phags pa shes rab kyi blo 'phel ba'i gzungs/_sh+lo ka lnga//_//mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor byang chub sems dpa'
[\[303b.4\]]brgyad dang bcas pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste/_bam po gnyis/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/_phan yon dang bcas pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste/_bam po gcig_/'phags pa lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_sh+lo ka
[\[303b.5\]]nyis brgya/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/_'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa
[\[303b.6\]]brgyad pa/_sh+lo ka sum cu/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu/_'phags pa lha mo nor gyi rgyun ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu//_//bstod pa sna tshogs la/_slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa/_sh+lo ka lnga bcu/_dpe
[\[303b.7\]]med par bstod pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa lnga/_'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gnyis/_bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa/_sh+lo ka bco brgyad/_don dam par bstod pa/_sh+lo ka bcu/_sku gsum la bstod pa/_sh+lo ka dgu/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bstod pa'i tshig gi sdeb sbyor
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]slob dpon sgra gcan 'dzin bzang pos mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan mu med par bstod pa/_slob dpon rat+naDa pas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/_'phags pa lha mo sgrol ma 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol bar bstod pa/_slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad
[\[304a.2\]]pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/_slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pas bsngags pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste/_bam po gnyis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i gnas su bstod pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste/_bam po gcig_/sangs rgyas
[\[304a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa la spobs pa skyes pa/_sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag na rdo rje 'dzin rnams kyis bstod pa/_sh+lo ka drug cu/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag na rdo rje 'dzin rnams kyis bstod pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu/_'phags pa spyan ras
[\[304a.4\]]gzigs dbang phyug la snying rje'i bstod pa/_sh+lo ka bco lnga/_'phags pa gnod 'dzin la bstod pa/_rgyal po shi wi kra ma a dI r+yas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka sum cu/_nad kyi bdag mo la bstod pa bram ze mchog sred kyis byas pa/_sh+lo ka sum cu/_lha mo nam gru la bstod pa/_sh+lo ka bco lnga//_//smon lam
[\[304a.5\]]sna tshogs la/_'phags pa yongs su bsngo ba'i rgyal po sngags dang bcas pa/_sh+lo ka lnga brgya ste/_bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka nyis brgya/_'phags pa nor bu rin po che dge ba brtan pa yongs su bsngo ba'i rgyal po/_/sh+lo ka brgya sum cu/_'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed
[\[304a.6\]]pa'i bsngo ba/_sh+lo ka lnga bcu/_'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa'i bsngo ba/_sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/_'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi bsngo ba/_sh+lo ka brgya sum cu/_'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam/_sh+lo ka sum cu/_'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/_/sh+lo ka
[\[304a.7\]]dgu bcu rtsa bdun/_'phags pa smon lam bdun cu pa/_sh+lo ka brgyad cu rtsa gsum/_mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gsum/_rin po che phreng ba'i smon lam/_sh+lo ka bco brgyad/_byang chub dam pa'i smon lam/_sh+lo ka phyed dang bcu bzhi/_byang chub dam pa'i rjes su mos pa'i smon
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]lam/_sh+lo ka bcu tham pa//_//bkra shis kyi rnam grangs la/_bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa chen po sh+lo ka sum cu/_shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/_sh+lo ka lnga bcu/_bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa drug_/bkra shis su bya'i tshigs su
[\[304b.2\]]bcad pa/_sh+lo ka bcu bdun/_bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_blo ka sum cu rtsa phyed dang lnga/_yang bde legs su bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/_sh+lo ka bcu gnyis/_yang bde legs su gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/_sgo ka dgu//_//'dul ba'i sde snod la/_'dul
[\[304b.3\]]ba lung gzhi/_sh+lo ka sum khri nyis stong bdun brgya ste bam po brgya rtsa dgu/_'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_sh+lo ka nyi khri bzhi stong dgu brgya ste/_bam po brgyad cu rtsa gsum/_'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_sh+lo ka nyi khri bzhi stong drug brgya ste bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis/_'dul ba gzhung bla ma/_
[\[304b.4\]]sh+lo ka khri drug stong nyis brgya ste bam po lnga bcu rtsa bzhi/_'dul ba zhus lan/_sh+lo ka sum stong sum brgya ste bam po bcu gcig yan chad 'gyur/_dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_sh+lo ka bdun stong bzhi brgya ste bam po nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /_sh+lo ka nyis brgya/_dge slong pha'i so sor thar ba'i
[\[304b.5\]]lam/_/sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste/_bam po gnyis dang /_sh+lo ka brgya/_dge slong ma'i so sor thar pa'i mdo/_/sh+lo ka brgyad brgya ste/_bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka nyis brgya/_'dul ba mdo/_/sh+lo ka nyis stong bdun brgya ste bam po dgu/_las brgya rtsa gcig pa/_sh+lo ka sum stong drug
[\[304b.6\]]brgya ste bam po bcu gnyis/_'dul ba bsdus pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste bam po bco lnga/_'dul ba bzhi'i rgya cher 'grel ba/_sh+lo ka sum stong sum brgya ste bam po bcu gcig_/'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig gi bshad pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste bam po bco lnga/_'dul ba phran
[\[304b.7\]]tshegs 'grel ba/_sh+lo ka sum stong ste bam po bcu/_'dul ba gzhung bla ma'i rgya cher 'grel ba/_sh+lo ka drug stong ste bam po nyi shu/_so sor thar pa'i rgya cher 'grel ba chen po/_/sh+lo ka sum khri sum stong drug brgya ste bam po brgya rtsa bcu gnyis/_so sor thar pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/_'dul
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]ba kun las btus pa/_sh+lo ka khri lnga stong ste/_bam po lnga bcu/_so sor thar pa'i gzhung 'grel/_sh+lo ka brgyad stong chig brgya ste bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun/_yang so sor thar pa'i 'grel ba/_sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste bam po bdun/_so sor thar pa'i tshig
[\[305a.2\]]gi brjed byang /_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_dge slong ma'i so sor thar pa'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_'dul ba'i mdo'i rgya cher 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka nyi khri chig stong ste bam po bdun cu//_//thams cad yod par smra ba dge tshul gyi tshig le'ur byas
[\[305a.3\]]pa/_sh+lo ka lnga bcu/_tshig le'ur byas pa sum brgya pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig_/sum brgya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa 'od ldan/_sh+lo ka nyis stong bzhi brgya ste bam po brgyad/_'dul ba dri ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_sh+lo ka brgya/_'dul ba dri ba'i tshig gi rgya cher bshad pa/_sh+lo ka
[\[305a.4\]]stong drug brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi ste bam po lnga dang sh+lo ka brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi/_sde pa bco brgyad kyi ming dang rim pa/_slob dpon dul ba'i lhas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka drug cu rtsa lnga/_gzhung tha dad pa bklag pa'i 'khor lo las sde pa tha dad pa bstan pa/_slob dpon dbyig pa shes kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka lnga bcu/_
[\[305a.5\]]dge slong gi tshul/_mkhan po bo d+hi sa twas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka lnga bcu/_ma byin par len pa'i skabs na/_mkhan po bzhis dpyad pa sh+lo ka nyi shu//_//theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i tI kA la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum gyi 'grel pa chen po/_/sh+lo ka nyi khri sum stong bzhi brgya ste bam
[\[305a.6\]]po bdun cu rtsa brgyad/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum dang nyi khri lnga stong dang /_khri brgyad stong pa'i rgya cher bshad pa sh+lo ka brgyad stong chig brgya ste bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/_mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po
[\[305a.7\]]gnyis/_mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rgya cher 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/_'phags pa sdud pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste/_bam po drug_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya ba'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa/_
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste bam po bdun/_yang bdun brgya ba'i bshad pa/_slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste bam po drug_/yang bdun brgya ba'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_yang bdun brgya ba'i bshad pa/_slob dpon dz+nyA na mi tras mdzad
[\[305b.2\]]pa/_sh+lo ka brgya/_tshul brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon dz+nyA na mi tras mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_yang tshul brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa gsang sngags kyi tshul du bshad pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig_/'phags pa rdo rje gcod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/_
[\[305b.3\]]slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste/_bam po lnga/_yang rdo rje gcod pa'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste/_bam po gnyis/_yang rdo rje gcod pa'i rnam par bshad pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya lnga bcu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo
[\[305b.4\]]ka lnga bcu/_yang rdo rje gcod pa'i rnam par bshad pa tshig le'ur byas pa/_sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa bdun/_'phags pa shes rab snying po'i rgya cher 'grel pa/_slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste/_bam po gcig_/'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i TI kA chen
[\[305b.5\]]po/_sh+lo ka khri brgyad stong ste bam po drug cu/_yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/_slob dpon klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka khri nyis stong ste bam po bzhi bcu/_yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i byams pa'i le'u nyi tshe bshad pa/_slob dpon ye shes
[\[305b.6\]]snying pos mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya bdun cu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka bdun cu/_yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i bsdus 'grel/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig_/yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i bshad pa/_slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka nyis brgya nyi
[\[305b.7\]]shu/_'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chos nyid zab mo'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka drug stong ste bam po nyi shu/_'phags pa sa bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi stong nyis brgya drug cu ste bam po bcu bzhi dang
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]sh+lo ka drug cu/_sa bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i bshad pa/_sh+lo ka sum stong drug brgya ste bam po bcu gnyis/_sa bcu pa'i gleng gzhi'i bshad pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig_/sa bcu pa'i don bsdus pa/_sh+lo ka lnga bcu/_'phags pa puN+Da rI
[\[306a.2\]]ka'i don bsdus pa/_sh+lo ka brgya/_'phags pa ga ya mgo ri'i mdo'i rnam par bshad pa/_sh+lo ka brgya sum cu/_'phags pa ga ya mgo ri'i mdo dang spel mar bshad pa/_sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya/_'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i rnam par bshad pa/_slob
[\[306a.3\]]dpon ngang tshul bzang pos mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka dgu brgya bzhi bcu ste bam po gsum dang sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/_sangs rgyas kyis las tshig gi don bsdus pa/_sh+lo ka brgyad cu/_'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i 'od srungs kyi le'u'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste bam po drug_/
[\[306a.4\]]'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste/_bam po bdun/_'phags pa sA lu ljang pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu ste/_bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/_sA lu ljang pa'i mdo tshigs bcad du bsdus pa'i 'grel pa/_
[\[306a.5\]]slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi/_'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka stong sum brgya rtsa bco lnga ste bam po bzhi dang /_sh+lo ka brgya rtsa bco lnga/_sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa'i tshig
[\[306a.6\]]le'ur byas pa/_sh+lo ka brgya dgu bcu/_'phags pa rnam par mi rtog pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_'phags pa sgo drug pa'i gzungs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug_/
[\[306a.7\]]yang sgo drug pa'i gzungs kyi bshad pa/_sh+lo ka sum cu rtsa gcig_/'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa gsum la/_sh+lo ka drug brgya sum cu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka sum cu/_'phags pa chos bzhi pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig_/
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]'phags pa chos bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa sh+lo ka sum cu/_yang chos bzhi pa'i bshad pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa bzhi/_'phags pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka nyis brgya/_'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa/_slob dpon shAkya bshes gnyen gyis
[\[306b.2\]]mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka brgyad brgya ste bam po gnyis dang /_sh+lo ka nyis brgya/_yang bzang po spyod pa'i bshad sbyar/_slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka lnga brgya ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka nyis brgya/_yang bzang po spyod pa'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos
[\[306b.3\]]mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu ste bam po phyed dang gnyis/_bzang po spyod pa'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon rgyan bzang pos mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu ste bam po phyed dang gnyis/_yang bzang po spyod pa'i 'grel pa rnam pa bzhi ka las btus te brjed byang du bgyis pa mkhan po
[\[306b.4\]]ye shes sdes mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_dgongs pa bzhi dang /_ldem por dgongs pa bzhi bshad pa'i brjed byang /_mkhan po ye shes sdes mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka nyis brgya//_//mdo sde'i TI kA rgya las bsgyur ba la/_'phags pa
[\[306b.5\]]dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i TI kA chen po/_/sh+lo ka khri nyis stong chig brgya ste bam po bdun cu rtsa bzhi/_yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i TI kA_/sh+lo ka nyis stong bdun rgya ste bam po dgu/_'phags pa puN+Da rI ka'i 'grel pa rgya las bsgyur ba/_sh+lo ka drug stong ste bam po nyi shu/_
[\[306b.6\]]'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i 'grel pa chen po rgya las bsgyur ba/_sh+lo ka khri nyis stong ste bam po bzhi bcu/_yang lang kar gshegs pa'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka bdun brgya drug cu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya drug cu/_yang lang kar gshegs pa'i 'grel pa bin tar ta li las
[\[306b.7\]]bsgyur ba/_sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/_'phags pa rdo rje gcod pa'i 'grel pa/_rgya las bsgyur ba/_sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/_chos kyi rgya mo'i bshad pa/_sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi//_//dbu ma'i bstan bcos la/_dbu
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba/_sh+lo ka bzhi brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ste bam po gcig dang /_sh+lo ka brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu/_dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma/_sh+lo ka drug stong ste bam po nyi shu/_shes rab sgron ma'i rgya cher bshad
[\[307a.2\]]pa/_slob dpon spyan ras gzigs brtul zhugs kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka nyi khri bzhi stong ste bam po brgyad cu/_yang dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon bud+d+ha pA li tas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka sum stong ste bam po bcu/_yang dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa ga las 'jig med/_sh+lo ka nyis
[\[307a.3\]]stong chig brgya ste bam po bdun/_dbu ma rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa/_sh+lo ka brgya/_dbu ma rgyan gyi 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_dbu ma rgyan gyi dka' 'grel/_sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/_bden pa gnyis rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_sh+lo
[\[307a.4\]]ka sum cu rtsa bdun/_bden pa gnyis rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig_/bden pa gnyis rnam par 'byed pa'i dka' 'grel/_sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/_dbu ma de kho na nyid snang ba/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_dbu ma
[\[307a.5\]]snang ba/_sh+lo ka nyis stong dgu brgya ste bam po dgu/_de kho na nyid la 'jug pa'i rab tu byed pa/_sh+lo ka sum cu/_de kho na la 'jug pa'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka nyis brgya/_de kho na nyid la rtsod pa bzlog pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig_/rtsod pa bzlog pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_
[\[307a.6\]]sh+lo ka bdun cu/_rtsod pa bzlog pa'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi brgya ste bam po gcig dang /_sh+lo ka brgya/_rigs pa drug cu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_sh+lo ka drug cu rtsa gnyis/_rigs pa drug cu pa'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka bdun brgya drug cu ste bam po gnyis dang /_sh+lo ka
[\[307a.7\]]brgya drug cu/_stong pa nyid bdun cu pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa bzhi/_stong pa nyid bdun cu pa'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka nyis brgya brgyad cu/_stong pa nyid kyi sgo bcu gnyis pa rtsa ba dang 'grel par bcas pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_rten cing 'brel
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]par 'byung ba'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang /_de'i rnam par bshad pa/_sh+lo ka lnga bcu rtsa bzhi/_lag pa'i tshad kyi tshig le'ur byas pa/_sh+lo ka lnga/_lag pa'i tshad kyi 'grel pa sh+lo ka lnga/_lag pa'i tshad kyi 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu/_yang lag pa'i chad kyi 'grel
[\[307b.2\]]pa/_sh+lo ka bdun cu/_byang chub sems kyi rnam par bshad pa/_sh+lo ka nyis brgya/_dbu ma'i snying po mdor bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa/_sh+lo ka brgyad cu/_chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par grub pa/_slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka lnga brgya ste bam po gcig
[\[307b.3\]]dang /_sh+lo ka nyis brgya/_sku gsum la 'jug pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug_/sku gsum la 'jug pa'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka bdun brgya lnga bcu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu//_//bsam gtan gyi yi ge la/_bsgom pa'i rim pa
[\[307b.4\]]rnam pa gsum slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad/_sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/_bsgom pa'i rim pa slob dpon badzra kI rtis mdzad pa/_bam po gcig_/yang bsgom pa'i rim pa slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad pa/_bam po gcig_/byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa slob
[\[307b.5\]]dpon rgyal ba'i 'od kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka brgya/_yang byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa/_slob dpon many+dzu shrI mi tras mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka drug cu rtsa brgyad/_bsgom pa'i sgo bstan pa/_slob dpon ka la ya na warmas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka drug cu rtsa bdun/_bsgom pa'i rim pa/_
[\[307b.6\]]slob dpon d+ha rma ma tis mdzad pa sh+lo ka sum cu/_bsam gtan gyi yi ge rgya las bsgyur ba/_slob dpon bo d+hi d+ha rma ta ras mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum//_//rnam par shes pa'i bstan bcos la/_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las/_sa mang po ba sh+lo ka bdun stong
[\[307b.7\]]brgyad brgya ste bam po nyi shu rtsa drug_/gzhi bsdu ba/_sh+lo ka lnga stong bdun brgya dgu bcu ste bam po bcu dgu dang sh+lo ka dgu bcu/_rnam grangs bsdu ba/_sh+lo ka bdun brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga/_nyan thos kyi sa/_sh+lo ka lnga stong bzhi brgya ste bam po bco
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]brgyad/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa/_sh+lo ka drug stong chig brgya lnga bcu ste bam po nyi shu dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/_rnam par bshad pa'i sgo bsdu ba sh+lo ka lnga bcu ste bam po gcig dang /_sh+lo ka nyis brgya lnga bcu/_rnam par gtan la dbab pa bsdu ba/_sh+lo ka khri
[\[308a.2\]]chig stong lnga brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste bam po sum cu rtsa brgyad dang /_sh+lo ka brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga/_sa mang po'i rgya cher bshad pa/_sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste bam po bdun/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon rgya mtsho sprin gyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka drug stong ste bam po nyi shu/_rnal
[\[308a.3\]]'byor spyod pa'i sa las dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa le'u nyi tshe bshad pa logs su phyung ba/_sh+lo ka sum brgya drug cu rtsa lnga ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka drug cu rtsa lnga/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u nyi tshe bshad pa logs su phyung ba/_sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/_de'i rgya cher
[\[308a.4\]]bshad pa sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/_'dul ba bsdus pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_theg pa chen po bsdus pa/_sh+lo ka stong chig brgya bdun cu ste bam po gsum dang sh+lo ka nyis brgya bdun cu/_theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i bshad sbyar/_sh+lo ka sum stong sum cu ste
[\[308a.5\]]bam po bcu dang sh+lo ka sum cu/_don gsang ba bsdus pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi stong nyis brgya ste bam po bcu bzhi/_chos mngon pa kun las btus pa/_sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste bam po drug_/de'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka sum stong sum brgya ste bam po bcu gcig_/mdo sde rgyan gyi tshig
[\[308a.6\]]le'ur byas pa/_sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/_mdo sde rgyan gyi bshad pa/_sh+lo ka sum stong nyis brgya bdun cu ste bam po bcu dang /_sh+lo ka nyis brgya bdun cu/_mdo sde rgyan gyi 'grel bshad/_sh+lo ka sum stong drug brgya ste bam po bcu gnyis/_dbus dang mtha' rnam par
[\[308a.7\]]'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_sh+lo ka bdun cu/_de'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya bzhi bcu ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/_de'i 'grel bshad/_sh+lo ka sum stong lnga brgya ste bam po bcu gcig dang /_sh+lo ka nyis brgya/_phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa'i sh+lo ka brgya sum cu rtsa gnyis/_
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]phung po lnga'i rnam par bshad pa/_sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya lnga bcu rtsa gcig ste bam po lnga dang /_sh+lo ka sum stong lnga bcu rtsa gcig_/phung po lnga'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste bam po gnyis dang /_sh+lo ka brgya/_phung po lnga'i bshad pa/_
[\[308b.2\]]slong dpon sa'i rtsa lag gis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/_phung po lnga'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon blo gros brtan pas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi/_sum cu pa'i rab tu byed pa/_sh+lo ka sum cu/_sum cu pa'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon blo gros
[\[308b.3\]]brtan pas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste bam po gnyis dang /_sh+lo ka brgya/_sum cu pa'i 'grel bshad/_sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga ste bam po lnga dang sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa lnga/_nyi shu pa'i rab tu byed pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu/_nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka brgya sum cu/_nyi shu
[\[308b.4\]]pa'i 'grel bshad/_sh+lo ka bdun brgya lnga bcu ste bam po phyed dang gsum/_rnam par bshad pa'i rigs pa/_sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste bam po bcu/_rnam par bshad pa'i rigs pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon yon tan blo gros kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste bam po bco lnga/_las
[\[308b.5\]]bsgrub pa la rab tu byed pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig_/de'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi/_rten cing 'grel par 'byung ba'i rgya cher bshad pa/_bam po bzhi/_de'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka sum stong sum brgya ste bam po bcu gcig//_//theg pa
[\[308b.6\]]chen po'i bstan bcos sna tshogs la/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa kun las btus pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi stong nyis brgya ste bam po bcu bzhi/_skyes pa rabs kyi rgyud/_sh+lo ka sum stong drug brgya ste bam po bcu gnyis/_mdo sde sna tshogs kyi mdo bsdus pa/_sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya
[\[308b.7\]]ste bam po bdun/_mdo kun las btus pa/_sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_rin po che'i phreng pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_de'i 'grel pa sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi/_pha
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa btus pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_tshigs su bcad pa'i don btus pa/_sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka brgya/_shes rab brgya pa'i rab tu
[\[309a.2\]]byed pa/_sh+lo ka brgya/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi bcu rtsa bdun/_de bshad pa/_sh+lo ka nyis brgya/_grogs po'i spring yig_/sh+lo ka brgya/_de'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon blo gros chen pos mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya lnga bcu ste bam po bzhi
[\[309a.3\]]dang /_sh+lo ka lnga bcu/_slob ma la spring ba'i spring yig slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka nyis brgya/_de'i dka' 'grel slob dpon bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka brgya/_rgyal po ka ni ka la spring ba'i spring yig slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka brgya/_
[\[309a.4\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu la spring ba'i spring yig_/sh+lo ka bcu gnyis/_gces pa brgyad cu pa/_sh+lo ka brgyad cu/_sdom pa nyi shu pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu/_de'i 'grel pa slob dpon shAn+ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa/_bam po gnyis/_tshigs su
[\[309a.5\]]bcad pa brgya pa slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka brgya/_tshigs su bcad pa'i mdzod/_slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka brgya/_lta ba'i bye brag slob dpon nyi ma'i 'od kyis mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/_'jig rten pha rol bsgrub pa/_mkhan po
[\[309a.6\]]ye shes sdes mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka sum cu/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/_rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka brgya rtsa bcu/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/_
[\[309a.7\]]sh+lo ka sum cu/_de'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_sh+lo ka bcu/_bstod pa brgya lnga bcu pa'i bshad pa slob dpon dga' byed snyan pas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/_gsang ba'i gnas su bstod pa'i 'grel pa/_bam po gsum//_//theg pa chung ngu'i
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]bstan bcos la/_chos mngon pa mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa/_sh+lo ka bdun brgya ste bam po gnyis dang /_sh+lo ka brgya/_mdzod kyi 'grel pa sh+lo ka dgu stong ste bam po sum cu/_de'i 'grel bshad slob dpon ya sho mi tras mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka khri brgyad stong ste bam po drug cu/_yang
[\[309b.2\]]mdzod kyi 'grel pa slob dpon saM g+ha b+ha dras mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi stong lnga brgya ste bam po bco lnga/_yang mdzod kyi 'grel pa/_slob dpon shAn+ti swa mas mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi stong sum brgya ste bam po bcu bzhi/_mdzod kyi thabs bsdus pa/_sh+lo ka sum stong ste bam po bcu/_chos
[\[309b.3\]]mngon pa la 'jug pa/_sh+lo ka bdun brgya lnga bcu ste bam po gnyis dang /_sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/_de'i rgya cher 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/_de'i snying po kun las btus pa/_sh+lo ka stong brgyad brgya lnga bcu ste bam po drug dang /_sh+lo ka lnga bcu//_//tar
[\[309b.4\]]ka'i phyogs la/_las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa brtags pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya ste bam po gnyis/_de'i 'grel pa sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/_rigs pa'i thigs pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig_/de'i 'grel pa/_slob dpon d+ha rma ut+tas mdzad pa/_sh+lo
[\[309b.5\]]ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/_de'i rgya cher bshad pa/_sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum/_rigs pa'i thigs pa'i phyogs snga ma/_slob dpon ka ma la shI las mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka brgya/_rigs pa'i thigs pa'i phyogs snga ma bsdus pa/_sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/_gtan
[\[309b.6\]]tshigs thigs pa sh+lo ka nyis brgya/_de'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka sum stong drug brgya ste bam po bcu gnyis/_'brel pa brtags pa/_sh+lo ka drug brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste bam po gnyis dang sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa bzhi/_dmigs pa brtag pa/_sh+lo ka brgyad/_de'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi brgya
[\[309b.7\]]lnga bcu rtsa lnga ste bam po gcig dang sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu rtsa lnga/_gzhan sel ba grub pa/_sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa gnyis/_thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa/_sh+lo ka lnga bcu/_bdag med pa grub pa/_sh+lo ka bdun cu rtsa gcig_/phyi rol gyi yul grub pa/_slob dpon shu pa gup+tas
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]mdzad pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig_/dbang phyug 'jug pa grub pa/_sh+lo ka drug cu rtsa dgu/_'jig rten pha rol grub pa/_sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/_de'i 'grel pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig_/thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa/_
[\[310a.2\]]sh+lo ka nyis brgya lnga bcu/_de bzhin gshegs pa brtags pa grub pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gcig_/spyi tha dad med pa dgag pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gcig_/spyi tha dad pa dgag pa/_sh+lo ka bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis/_dbu ma brtag pa/_sh+lo ka nyi shu rtsa gnyis/_thos pa brtag
[\[310a.3\]]pa/_sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig/_//btsad po khri srong lde btsan gyis mdzad pa'i gtsug lag la/_bka' yang dag pa'i tshad ma/_sh+lo ka nyis stong chig brgya ste bam po bdun/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i skad rta/_sh+lo ka stong lnga brgya ste bam po lnga/_
[\[310a.4\]]byams pa'i bstod pa chen po/_/sh+lo ka bzhi brgya ste bam po gcig dang /_sh+lo ka brgya/_byams pa'i bstod pa chung du/_sh+lo ka brgya lnga bcu/_grub pa'i mtha' 'gro ba/_sh+lo ka bzhi bcu/_dbu ma'i gzer bu/_sh+lo ka sum cu/_theg pa chen po'i bsam gtan gyi
[\[310a.5\]]man ngag gol sa brgyad btsal ba btsad pos bkas bcad pa/_sh+lo ka sum cu/_gsung rab zhu chen ma bgyis pa la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag bzhi pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa chen po gnyis gtan la ma phab/_bstan bcos bsgyur 'phro la/_dbu
[\[310a.6\]]ma'i gzhung zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa rtsa ba dang /_'grel par bcas pa gnyis/_dbu ma'i snying po rtog ge 'bar ba rtsa ba dang /_'grel par bcas pa gnyis/_tshad ma rnam 'grel/_bam po bcu gcig_/rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa/_bam po bco brgyad/_rtsod pa'i rigs pa/_
[\[310a.7\]]bam po gcig_/tshad ma de kho na bsdus pa rtsa ba dang 'grel par bcas pa gnyis/_gsung rab mdo sde dang bstan bcos thams cad la sh+lo ka dang /_bam po'i grangs gtan la phab ste zhu chen zin to 'tshal thams cad 'brug gi lo la pho brang lhan dkar du mtshan byang dkar chag tu btab pa rdzogs so//_//
